channel.title: Edgar Hernández | Software Development Services
channel.description: Recent content on Edgar Hernández | Software Development Services

item.title: Practifarma
item.description: Practifarma Practifarma is a web platform to improve the communication between medicine suppliers to sell and buy products. Responsible of design, development and deployment of Practifarma Platform, under the agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, XP, Lean Startup), Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment.

item.title: PractiB2B
item.description: PractiB2B PractiB2B is a Private Supplier Relationship Management Web Platform to any kind of industry, PractiB2B seeks to digitize purchasing management, to provide our customers with a technological tool that allows them to improve their management processes, as well as ensure control, transparency, competitiveness and profitability of their transactions. Responsible of design, development and deployment of Practifarma Platform, under the agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, XP, Lean Startup), Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment.

item.title: Github Repository
item.description: Personal projects Practices and projects that include different technologies like Java, Vertx, Angular, Jersey and a Repository for my participation in a Code Camp in 2016. Here are my personal practices or projects that allows me to learn and implement new technologies.
